job_description:
• Deep Chromium experienceDeep working experience in Node.
• Js and the underlying V8 Javascript engineExperience working with performance profiling and debugging tools for web based desktop applicationsFamiliarity with desktop development, along with the ability to understand and explain technical trade-offs and complexities of web based desktop applicationsExperience working with large scale open source projects (and having contributed to some is a big plus.
• )Experience writing understandable, testable code with an eye towards maintainability and scalability.
• Strong written and verbal communication skills, equally comfortable communicating with your immediate team, other frontend engineers, or even backend infrastructure engineers.
• Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering or a related field, or equivalent training, fellowship, or work experience.
